DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this NIS is to assess the prevalence of sympathetic overactivity in patients with newly diagnosed essential hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: The Prevalence of Sympathetic Overactivity in Primary Hypertensive Patients.
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed essential hypertension patients will be eligible for the study. Average of two or more systolic BP readings ≥ 140mmHg or diastolic BP readings ≥ 90mmHg History of coronary artery disease History of diabetes
DOC.keyword: The prevalence of sympathetic overactivity in hypertensive patients.
